fields.Title of Contribution: Using Project Based Learning to Inform Practice in Online Environments
fields.Description/Abstract: This article explores the complementary relationship and transformative potential of Project Based Learning infused e-learning environments. The foundations of effective implementation of each draw heavily on constructivist learning theories and it is this connection that creates a powerful dynamic to support the construction of knowledge through experiential, contextual, and social methods. Key principles that facilitate and support the learning process are discussed.
